description: A very good game. My wife and I played this a lot when I was first discovering the hobby. We still enjoy it and the vast options of expansions make for a different mixing each play.

Very popular with some of our friends, but we actually prefer this when there's just the two of us as some people seem to dislike varying the rules from game to game.  Over the years we've picked up most of the expansions and played it such a lot that we went off it a bit and started to keep it to play when other's insisted on it or to play with non-gamers.  However, we recently picked up the Winter edition to play over Christmas and have re-discovered the simplicity associated in the base game played with just two.****Keeper(s)!!!
I still like the game but I'm a bit burnt out on it now.
iOS
A classic for a reason. Love to play it 2 player and with someone who knows what they are doing.

title: It's an ev...
description: It's an evergreen classic for a reason

title: A classic of map-building
description: So satisfying to see the map uniquely built before your eyes each time you play!  It’s a mechanic I absolutely love.  This is a classic of elegantly simple turns with outsized depth of outcomes.  Play it casually with anyone, or play it ruthlessly with cunning opponents looking to trap you.  Great gateway game with pleasant visual design; will always be in my collection.

title: Great and ...
description: Great and light game, easy enough to teach with plenty of player interaction and strategy required (keep track of what pieces are left), expansions then add onto this simple idea to make it even better

title: A classic....
description: A classic. What can I say more!!

title: Can't argu...
description: Can't argue with the fun factor of this game. So simple, so enjoyable. Always a good time playing with family, friends or with competitive folks.

title: Weight: 1....
description: Weight: 1.94 / 5Includes custom bag for tilesIncludes wooden insert

title: This game ...
description: This game is easy to learn and play and everyone seems to enjoy it. Plays well with 2, 3, 4 or 5 players, which is rarely the case.

title: The only t...
description: The only time I've ever sat down to learn a game and play it in under an hour. Good.edit..have played this game loads over the last year (2007).  and i have to say it's deeper than i first relized. i you can play this as a casual percentage game (with beginers) or go really nasty aggressive (with your hard core carcassonne mates)..  truly great.

title: Great fill...
description: Great filler game for a game night.  Since it fills this role for me, I haven't bothered with any expansions (and probably won't).  I'm a big fan, and it's a great game to just have around for folks newer to hobby-style games.

title: First game...
description: First game my wife took to.  Play on iPhone all the time.

title: THE great ...
description: THE great tile placement game. Lots of fun. Probably the most played, most requested, game in our collection.

title: Great gate...
description: Great gateway game for just about anyone interested in learning Euro games.

title: Third game...
description: Third game. Played countless times before I started to record. Both expansions add a alot to the game, but made the game a bit longish for my kid who actualy demanded this one daily for a good month or more...

title: So many pe...
description: So many people recommended this game to me, but I just don't feel like it's my thing, meh...  Maybe one of the million expansions would improve it... shrugMy daughter loves this game and will just play with the tiles and meeples by herself; she calls it "the map game".

title: I don't ac...
description: I don't actually care for Carcassonne all that much as a game but that's personal preference. I want the gameplay to be as exciting for me as the map building but it's roo dependent on the players. That said, I do think it's a good game and accessible to pretty much everyone.

title: Something ...
description: Something just works so well about this game, the looks, the tactile tile-laying and meeples... this game just comes together and works so well. I'm always happy when I play.

title: Very casua...
description: Very casual light game to play with no gamers. Adds some strategy that makes you think in advance but not super intense or intimidating. Never really play with the farmer character feels like a wonky rule.

title: With Inns ...
description: With Inns and Cathedrals Exp

title: Not my sty...
description: Not my style. Not fun for me.

title: A great cl...
description: A great classic. Few games have managed to replicate the satisfaction of tile placement. The passive aggression in this game gives it a lasting longevity.

title: Have two c...
description: Have two copies, one with all the expansion sets up through Princess & Dragon, one with just the River, Traders, and Builders (for shorter games!).

title: Only own d...
description:

title: I don't se...
description: I don't see the appeal in this one. It's okay and I wouldn't turn down a game but there are many, many more I'd rather play instead.
